title: Sneaky wore the Super Crown once

embed.description: Update: The beloved C9 ADC and streamer has done it again, but this time with Pizza Delivery Sivir. He looks great as usual! We at the Rift Herald are questioning if we're going to have to bump this post every time he makes a new cosplay, but we don't really have any issues with doing that, so ...

body:
I showed this picture to a  friend and he replied :"She's kinda cute!"

Told him who it was...and now he's confused. 

(I saw him cry internally when I showed him the Bowsette memes)


very fun stuff.

replies.body: Sneaky: Making Pizza sexy again since ....the last time you ordered pizza (4 days ago).

You're a terrible human, but the good kind of terrible human.
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

> [{quoted}](name=youre all trash,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7BpQxAEY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-09-26T10:42:06.251+0000)
>
> You're a terrible human, but the good kind of terrible human.
> {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

That's my schtick. pleasantly distracting until the truck hits ya.
what you're saying is manly fistbump/nohomo hug?

I don't know how people can't actually recognize it's a male not a female. Just look at his hands, fists and you can see how they are more made for men. They look stronger and not ordinary for a girl. Look at other things and it's same shit.

> [{quoted}](name=PowerSlave993,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7BpQxAEY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-09-26T12:20:46.560+0000)
>
> I don't know how people can't actually recognize it's a male not a female. Just look at his hands, fists and you can see how they are more made for men. They look stronger and not ordinary for a girl. Look at other things and it's same shit.

Counter-example: booksellers tend to have a stronger build than most office workers, because they work with and around wares that actually weigh quite a bit (especially in those big cardboards filled to the brim with school books, the densest ones; heaviest one I had to lift weighed a little over 30 kg, and I'm around 60 kg myself). Their backs and arms are pretty muscled (above average, at least), and their hands can suffer a few cuts from sharp cardboard or even box cutters, plus the usual callus, giving them a rather rough-looking skin.
Same goes for people who work in e.g. the production area of a car manufacturer: they'll be muscled all over (a fair bit more than most booksellers, of course), look rather rough.
Thus, nope. You can't reliably recognise a female from a male just by looking at their hands, you'll need far more than just that. I'm a victim of such prejudices, so I can tell you at least that ;D

Also, it's pretty easy to say that when you already know the person. Or maybe you're an ace and 99% of the people who were shown pictures of Sneaky are dumb, your call.

__Edit__: and boy does he look good, especially as Sivir.

When i first saw the image, i knew it was something wrong with the person. Not seeing anyone talking who that is. And yes he looks good for trasngender and for other unhealthy things on this world. Jesus christ

I won't start any sort of debate about what you deem unhealthy, but I feel like I need to point something out: Jesus questioned the beliefs of his contemporaries and was crucified for that; 2,000 years later, what will you do of people who question your beliefs?

As for me, most people don't feel like anything is off, or wrong, until they learn that I'm not a boy. When I was 20, a foreign 14-year-old took me for a 15-year-old male, and even most adult customers at the bookshop refer to me as "the boy who works here from time to time".

As a side note, it's pretty amusing to play ambiguously: people who think of me as a male are greeted with a sweet voice and fluid movements, others get to see my rougher side. Most of the time they won't know what to think any more. Come and pay us a visit next time you go to France!

I have a dispensary out here on east coast I like visiting, there's a girl there & 90% of the guys coming in don't even see her. they mostly think she's a dude. 

I might 3D print her a power crown for fun. I'm sure she'd love it if only for the lols she'll get.
The Super Crown contains Sneaky's powers.
